attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Checking all MP's thoroughly and vetted more stringently for character and behaviour defects before being allowed to represent the public on any matter. And that they be regularly checked  for such mal-behaviorals  on a regular basis as there seems to be a great lack of respect and distrust of them in our society at present due to their lack of accountability and onerous behaviours.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
